caption.p: Sine function fits to monthly average data from Mace Head, Ireland. The black curves give the least-squares regressions to the fundamental (upper black curve) and second harmonic (lower black curve) terms, and the blue curve shows their sum. The data points about the x-axis are the residuals between the measurements and the fundamental fit. The fit parameters with 95% confidence limits are annotated. A small, long-term trend has been removed from the monthly average data before fitting (data from Parrish et al., 2016). DOI: https://doi.org/10.1525/elementa.279.f1
